name: yearn-vaults-v2-subgraph

scripts.build:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:fantom: yarn prepare:fantom && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:optimism: yarn prepare:optimism && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.thegraph:deploy:mainnet: yarn build:mainnet &&  graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ rareweasel/yearn-vaults-v2-subgraph-mainnet
scripts.thegraph:deploy:fantom: yarn build:fantom && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ yearn/yearn-vaults-v2-fantom
scripts.thegraph:deploy:arbitrum: yarn build:arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ yearn/yearn-vaults-v2-arbitrum
scripts.thegraph:deploy:optimism: yarn build:optimism && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ yearn/yearn-vaults-v2-optimism
scripts.create-local: yarn create-local:mainnet && yarn create-local:fantom && yarn create-local:arbitrum
scripts.remove-local: yarn remove-local:mainnet && yarn remove-local:fantom && yarn remove-local:arbitrum
scripts.deploy-local:mainnet: yarn build:mainnet && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 yearn-vaults-v2/mainnet
scripts.deploy-local:fantom: yarn build:fantom && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 yearn-vaults-v2/fantom
scripts.deploy-local:arbitrum: yarn build:arbitrum && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 yearn-vaults-v2/arbitrum
scripts.test: yarn clean && yarn codegen && graph test -v 0.4.0

//: graph-cli, graph-ts, and matchstick-as often have breaking changes in their minor versions, so they are pinned.
